CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_landing', false, 'tZyOKbtBW1Y6jgOgyl3rm-ghuJUJsbLCHIgBPzIXDfk', 'v3.5.0--ry4u2s_7_gKNSKfU0UrlS_bIKyvWPX9WFN23QQXyPUY', 'Loqw6vgyje39VaNK4nhthNl_aDhrthlMZ-Hzu0n5xWg'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_landing; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_landing (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure

UPDATE _content_info SET ready = true WHERE id = 'checksum_landing'; -- meta
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_docs', false, '34VO9dvAPvtpqIagDKzbpgcpKTSRhud0mLOnSKb5i1E', 'v3.5.0--oujYFLim_yxeXBABvCGjz820pyizjewp3LuKvwBeG4Y', 'uiXMOoF9ENHmQY8dPs2q6_blUYZWmsV-zbqZYMyWKAg'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_docs; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_docs (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "links" TEXT NULL, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure

INSERT INTO _content_docs VALUES ('docs/2.salesforce/10.google-analytics.md', 'Google Analytics', '{"type":"minimark","value":[["h1",{"id":"google-analytics"},"Google Analytics"],["h2",{"id":"setup"},"Setup"],["p",{},"Heeet allows you to send any offline conversions data from Salesforce to GA4.\nIn order to use this feature you first need to configure a GA4 account."],["h2",{"id":"create-a-ga4-account"},"Create a GA4 Account"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Go to ",["code",{},"Heeet > Settings > Google Analytics"]," (A)"],["li",{},"Click on ",["code",{},"Create"]," (B)"],["li",{},"Give a name to this GA4 Account (ie: Heeet) (C)"],["li",{},"Go to ",["code",{},"GA4 > Admin > Data Collection and Modification > Data Streams and select the relevant website Data Stream."]," Measurement ID always start with ",["code",{},"G-XXXXXX"]," Then paste it in the Measurement ID field (D)."],["li",{},"Go to ",["code",{},"GA4 > Admin > Data Collection and Modification > Data Streams > Select the relevant website Data Stream"]," and scroll down to the Measurement Protocol API secrets sections."],["li",{},"Click on Create and copy paste the API Secret in the settings field €"]],["p",{},["img",{"alt":"image info","src":"./images/ga-a.png"}]],["h2",{"id":"create-data-trigger"},"Create Data Trigger"],["p",{},"Once you added a GA4 account, you can create a « data\ntrigger ».\nA trigger is an event happening in Salesforce that should be\nsent to GA4 as an event"],["ul",{},["li",{},"To create your first event, go to ",["code",{},"Go to Heeet > Settings > Google Analytics > Event Triggers"]," Click on ",["code",{},"New"]]],["p",{},["img",{"alt":"image info","src":"./images/ga-b.png"}]],["ul",{},["li",{},"Give your Trigger a unique name (A)"],["li",{},"Select what object this trigger is based on (B)"],["li",{},"Check the « Enabled » checkbox to activate it (C)"],["li",{},"Select GA4 account(s) this event should be sent to (D)"]],["p",{},["img",{"alt":"image info","src":"./images/ga-c.png"}]],["h3",{"id":"create-data-trigger-conditions"},"Create Data Trigger Conditions"],["p",{},"You can define what should be the Salesforce conditions to\nactivate this trigger and send the data to GA4."],["ul",{},["li",{},"Click on « Add »"],["li",{},"Select the field on which you want to apply a condition"],["li",{},"Fill in the value which should trigger the event"]],["p",{},"Please note that you have to paste the API name of the\nfield value.\nExemple:\nYou want to send an event to GA4 when a lead is\nconverted. Then you will have to select the API name of\nthe Lead Status field"],["p",{},["img",{"alt":"image info","src":"./images/ga-d.png"}]],["h3",{"id":"create-data-trigger-values"},"Create Data Trigger Values"],["p",{},"Once you completed the Conditions part, you can customize the Event values.\nYou can send either a String value, a Number value or use a Field value from the selected object.\nWe usually recommend to use the following Event Fields."],["ul",{},["li",{},["strong",{},"Event Category"]," : we usually tell our customers to use a generic value to easily find all events related to a specific Category such as ",["code",{},"Salesforce Offline Event"],", we recommend to use a string value"],["li",{},["strong",{},"Event Label"]," : here you can set a clear label such as ",["code",{},"Converted Lead"]," or ",["code",{},"Salesforce Closed Won Opportunity"],", we recommend to use a string value,"],["li",{},["strong",{},"Event Action"]," : you can set a string value such as ",["code",{},"Heeet Automated Event"]],["li",{},["strong",{},"Event Value"]," : usually we recommend our customers to use a number field set to 1 for unique events such as ",["code",{},"converted leads"]," but to use an object value for transactional event such as ",["code",{},"closed won opportunity"],". If you want to send the Amount Opportunity value, then select type = Field and value"],["li",{},["strong",{},"Event Name"]," : you need to create first an event in GA4 and use the exact same event name as string value"]],["p",{},["img",{"alt":"image info","src":"./images/ga-f.png"}],["img",{"alt":"image info","src":"./images/ga-e.png"}]],["h2",{"id":"google-analytics-features"},"Google Analytics Features"],["p",{},"With Google Analytics integration, you can:"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Send offline conversion data from Salesforce to GA4"],["li",{},"Track lead conversions and opportunity closures"],["li",{},"Create custom events based on Salesforce field changes"],["li",{},"Maintain a complete view of your marketing funnel"],["li",{},"Analyze the full customer journey from online to offline"]]],"toc":{"title":"","searchDepth":1,"depth":2,"links":[{"id":"setup","depth":2,"text":"Setup"},{"id":"create-a-ga4-account","depth":2,"text":"Create a GA4 Account"},{"id":"create-data-trigger","depth":2,"text":"Create Data Trigger","children":[{"id":"create-data-trigger-conditions","depth":3,"text":"Create Data Trigger Conditions"},{"id":"create-data-trigger-values","depth":3,"text":"Create Data Trigger Values"}]},{"id":"google-analytics-features","depth":2,"text":"Google Analytics Features"}]}}', '', 'md', NULL, '{}', 'true', '/salesforce/google-analytics', '{"title":"Google Analytics","description":""}', '2.salesforce/10.google-analytics', 'HOAZlVQc-Ia-W7di_L2auk1heN9JtnDXOO2xf1IaNDE'); -- HOAZlVQc-Ia-W7di_L2auk1heN9JtnDXOO2xf1IaNDE

material-theme-palenight","code":"  <script>\n    (function(i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {\n        i[''_heeet''] = r;\n        i[r] = i[r] || function() {\n            (i[r].q = i[r].q || m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);\n        a.addEventListener(''load'', function(e) {\n\n            //call the heeet functions here\n\n        }, false);\n    })(window, document, ''script'', ''https://javascript.heeet.io'', ''_heeet'');\n</script>\n","language":"javascript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{},"  <script>\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{},"    (function(i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{},"        i[''_heeet''] = ''_heeet'');\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":17},["span",{},"</script>\n"]]]],["h2",{"id":"save-user-journey"},"Save user journey"],["pre",{"className":"language-javascript shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"heeetSaveJourney({\n   sessionDuration: 1440,\n   contentInfluenceTrackedPages : [''/pricing'', ''/blog''],\n   enabledSubDomains : true\n})\n","language":"javascript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{},"heeetSaveJourney({\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{},"   sessionDuration: 1440,\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{},"   contentInfluenceTrackedPages : [''/pricing'', ''/blog''],\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{},"   enabledSubDomains : true\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{},"})\n"]]]],["table",{},["thead",{},["tr",{},["th",{"align":"left"},"Parameter"],["th",{"align":"left"},"Type"],["th",{"align":"left"},"Description"]]],["tbody",{},["tr",{},["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"sessionDuration"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"integer"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["strong",{},"Required"],". number of minutes before Heeet refresh the last click data. In this example 1440 minutes = 1 day. If a lead comes today from last click = SEO, this value will remain the same until tomorrow, even if it comes back from SEA in between."]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"contentInfluenceTrackedPages"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"string[]"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["strong",{},"Not Required"],". set what content you want to track as « Content Influence » in Salesforce. For example if you want to track all your blogs articles, just add ''/blog'' and Heeet will track all contents from page containing it. If you want to track your single pricing page, just add ''/pricing'' in this part. (set / to track every page)"]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"enabledSubDomains"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"boolean"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["strong",{},"Not Required"],". true if you have subdomains to track"]]]],["h2",{"id":"save-data-in-form"},"Save data in Form"],["pre",{"className":"language-javascript shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"heeet({\n  ga4MeasurementId: ''G-xxxxx'',\n  formCssSelector: [''#xxx'', ''.yyy''],\n  data : ''heeet-data'',\n  contentInfluences : ''heeet-content''\n})\n","language":"javascript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{},"heeet({\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{},"  ga4MeasurementId: ''G-xxxxx'',\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{},"  formCssSelector: [''#xxx'', ''.yyy''],\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{},"  data : ''heeet-data'',\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{},"  contentInfluences : ''heeet-content''\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{},"})\n"]]]],["table",{},["thead",{},["tr",{},["th",{"align":"left"},"Parameter"],["th",{"align":"left"},"Type"],["th",{"align":"left"},"Description"]]],["tbody",{},["tr",{},["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"ga4MeasurementId"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"string"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["strong",{},"Not Required"],". ga4MeasurementID ",["span",{},"mandatory"],": this is your GA4 Measurement ID which can be find in GA. Go to Admin > Data Collection and Modification > Data Streams and select the relevant website Data Stream. Measurement ID always start with G-XXXXXX"]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"formCssSelector"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"string[]"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["strong",{},"Required"],". this is the CSS class of the form you want to track. You can add multiple CSS values in this selector if you''re tracking multiple forms on your website"]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"data"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"string"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["strong",{},"Required"],". being used to send tracking data to Salesforce, make sure that your form includes a field with API Name called Heeet__Data__c which should be mapped to Salesforce Heeet__Data__c field (included in the package (can also be a css selector)"]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"contentInfluences"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"string"]],["td",{"align":"left"},["strong",{},"Required"],". being used to track what targeted contents the prospect visited on your website. Make sure that your form includes a field with API Name called Heeet__Content_influences__c which should be mapped to Salesforce Heeet__Content_influences__c field (included in the package). (can also be a css selector)"]]]],["h2",{"id":"implementation-example"},"Implementation Example"],["p",{},"Here''s a complete example of how to implement Heeet on your website:"],["pre",{"className":"language-html shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html>\n<head>\n    <title>Your Website</title>\n</head>\n<body>\n    <!-- Your website content -->\n    \n    <!-- Contact Form -->\n    <form id=\"contact-form\">\n        <input type=\"text\" name=\"name\" placeholder=\"Name\" required>\n        <input type=\"email\" name=\"email\" placeholder=\"Email\" required>\n        <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"Heeet__Data__c\" id=\"heeet-data\">\n        <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"Heeet__Content_influences__c\" id=\"heeet-content\">\n        <button type=\"submit\">Submit</button>\n    </form>\n\n    <!-- Heeet Script -->\n    <script>\n        (function(i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {\n            i[''_heeet''] = r;\n            i[r] = i[r] || function() {\n                (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)\n            }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date();\n            a = s.createElement(o), m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];\n            a.async = 1;\n            a.src = g;\n            m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);\n            a.addEventListener(''load'', function(e) {\n                // Initialize Heeet\n                heeetSaveJourney({\n                    sessionDuration: 1440,\n                    contentInfluenceTrackedPages: [''/pricing'', ''/blog''],\n                    enabledSubDomains: true\n                });\n\n                heeet({\n                    ga4MeasurementId: ''G-XXXXXXX'',\n                    formCssSelector: [''#contact-form''],\n                    data: ''heeet-data'',\n                    contentInfluences: ''heeet-content''\n                });\n            }, false);\n        })(window, document, ''script'', ''https://javascript.heeet.io'', ''_heeet'');\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n","language":"html","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"<!"],["span",{"class":"swJcz"},"DOCTYPE"],["span",{"class":"spNyl"},"            },"],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," ",["strong",{},"(F)"]," Please note that you have to paste the API name of the field value. Exemple: You want to send an event to Google Ads when a lead is converted. Then you will have to select the API name of the Lead « Status » field"],["li",{},"Select what amount field should be sent as conversion value ",["strong",{},"(G)"]],["li",{},"Finally, select what Gclid field (unique advertising ID associated to a user) should be used. ",["strong",{},"(H)"]],["li",{},"You can select either ",["code",{},"Heeet First Click Google Gclid"]," or ",["code",{},"Heeet Last Click Google Gclid"],"."]],["p",{},"Tip: if you want to use first click Gclid if last click Gclid is missing\nor last click Gclid is first click Gclid is missing, ask a Salesforce\nAdmin to build a Formula Field in Salesforce (« GCLID ») taking\none or the other Then you will have to select the API name of the Lead « Status » field"],["li",{},"Select what amount field should be sent as conversion value ",["strong",{},"(G)"]],["li",{},"Finally, select what Gclid field (unique advertising ID associated to a user) should be used.
